text: M6 or M-6 may mean: In roads: * M6 motorway, a motorway in the United Kingdom * M6 Toll, a toll motorway in the United Kingdom that relieves traffic on the M6 motorway * M6 (Ireland), a motorway-grade section of the N6 road in the Republic of Ireland * M6 motorway (Hungary), a motorway in Hungary * M-6 (Michigan highway), a state highway in southern Michigan * Russian route M6 is another name for the Caspian Highway in Russia
title: M6
